member.name: T:VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Controllers.PollingStationController
member.summary: Controller responsible for interacting with the polling stations - PollingStationInfo

member.name: M:VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Controllers.PollingStationController.Register(VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Models.AddPollingStationInfo)
member.summary: This method gets called when the observer saves the info regarding the arrival time, leave time, urban area, BESV president These info come together with the polling station id.
member.param: Info about the polling station and its' allocated observer

member.name: M:VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Controllers.PollingStationController.Update(VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Models.UpdatePollingStationInfo)
member.summary: This method gets called when updating information about the leave time. These info come together with the polling station id.
member.param: Polling station id, county code, leave time

member.name: M:VoteMonitor.Api.Location.Controllers.PollingStationController.PollingStationsLimits(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the polling stations' allocated per county
